text: Maria Tipo (23 December 1931 – 10 February 2025) was an Italian pianist. Tipo was born in Naples, Italy. Her recordings of Bach's Goldberg Variations and of sonatas by Domenico Scarlatti were awarded the "Diapason d’Or". Tipo died on 10 February 2025, at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Musicians from Naples Category:Italian pianists
title: Maria Tipo
